title: The 10 Must-Read Psychology Books Every Human Being Should Read | Durmonski
excerpt: Regardless of where you are in the pathway of understanding how the human psyche works, this list of must-read psychology books will upgrade your personal library.

title: Why do you feel lonely? Neuroscience is starting to find answers.
excerpt: A neuroscientist’s hunt for loneliness could help us better understand the costs of social isolation.

title: Navigating the mind: 40 major fields of psychology and neuroscience
excerpt: Psychology and neuroscience are such rapidly growing fields of research, it’s easy to get confused. If you’ve sometimes been scratching your head trying to figure out who does what, this guide is for you. We will cover 40 major fields of psychology and neuroscience using plain language explanations.

title: How the Brain Responds to Beauty
excerpt: Scientists search for the neural basis of an enigmatic experience

title: How to be lucky | Psyche Guides
excerpt: Most of us think that luck just happens (or doesn’t) but everyone can learn to look for the unexpected and find serendipity

title: A Quick And Easy Survival Guide For Dealing With Jerks
excerpt: Because some people never outgrow being bullies.

title: When Your Child Is a Psychopath
excerpt: The condition has long been considered untreatable. Experts can spot it in a child as young as 3 or 4. But a new clinical approach offers hope.
